B_TEXT: Now you can share any questions you have about the lesson with the relevant topic master through the discussions that have been added to the online applet yet, and the teacher will respond as soon as possible.
N_TEXT: You do not need to worry about your internet speed, in the new form that has been added to software, the application is capable of controlling the Internet Status Program. If your internet is too weak or uncomfortable, the software will go to the offline offline status.
F_TEXT: It will soon be available for Android, after you publish it, you can access all school content through your mobile at any time, anywhere, and work on the iSS version will start shortly.
